sentences.en: The sentence defines normative ethics by specifying the sense of the "norms" for which it searches.
sentences.cn: 这个句子通过指定它所寻找的“规范”的意义来定义规范性伦理。

sentences.en: In searching for norms in the sense of authoritative standards of what ought to be, rather than in the sense of what is average and thus can be considered normal, normative ethics aims to dictate.
sentences.cn: 在寻求规范的过程中，就意义上而言，寻找的是规定的权威标准规范，而不是从平均的角度被认定为常态化，规范的伦理目的在于指示。

sentences.en: The method is relatively normative and notional and structurely.
sentences.cn: 该方法是概念上和结构上相对规范。
